classes.description: List Bluemix services trained for suggestion
texts: Which bluemix services can you suggest for?
List all services you can suggest
Show me all services you can recommend
Suggest services to classify SMS messages or text
Recommend services to integrate weather data into my app
Show me services that can be used for analytics
Recommend services that can be added to my mobile app
Suggest a service that can be used for data caching.
Recommend a service that can manage deployments on the cloud
Which services can I use to integrate with Watson?
Find services that host databases on the cloud.
What service can I use for translating languages?
I'm looking for Bluemix services that help me manage my DevOps
